movie.title: Let the Lion Roar
movie.description_intro: Uncover one of the greatest and darkest deceptions of our time - the conspiracy to cover up the Church's true identity.
movie.description_full: Uncover one of the greatest and darkest deceptions of our time - the conspiracy to cover up the Church's true identity.

movies.title: My Birthday Romance
movies.summary: A woman tired of her parents nagging her to find a boyfriend makes a deal with a guy who also doesn't want a relationship to pose as her boyfriend to keep her family off her back until after her birthday party.
movies.description_full: A woman tired of her parents nagging her to find a boyfriend makes a deal with a guy who also doesn't want a relationship to pose as her boyfriend to keep her family off her back until after her birthday party.
movies.synopsis: A woman tired of her parents nagging her to find a boyfriend makes a deal with a guy who also doesn't want a relationship to pose as her boyfriend to keep her family off her back until after her birthday party.

movies.title: A Bronx Tale
movies.summary: The Bronx, New York, 1960. 9-year-old Calogero grows up admiring and fascinated by the local mob boss, Sonny. Calogero's father, Lorenzo, wants to have nothing to do with the mob and does his best to keep his son away from Sonny and mob business. However, it may prove a losing battle.

movies.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
movies.title_english: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
movies.title_long: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2 (2013)
movies.summary: After a 10 year absence, the Dark Knight has returned to Gotham to fight the Mutant threat. After defeating the mutants, he has taken control of a gang loyal to him in order to make Gotham a safer place. But, the Joker has decided to stop this, and fights against Batman in a deadly duel. Meanwhile, the Man of Steel is ordered to stop the Dark Knight because the government believes that his ways are wrong. As Batman fights the Joker, the Man of Steel prepares for his greatest fight.
movies.description_full: After a 10 year absence, the Dark Knight has returned to Gotham to fight the Mutant threat. Meanwhile, the Man of Steel is ordered to stop the Dark Knight because the government believes that his ways are wrong. As Batman fights the Joker, the Man of Steel prepares for his greatest fight.

movies.title: The Professional
movies.summary: French secret agent Joss Baumont is sent to one of the African countries to kill their president Njala. However, at the last moment the political situation changes and the French secret service turns him in to the African authorities, and he is sentenced to a long-term imprisonment. After the daring escape he returns to France and deliberately informs his former chiefs of his presence promising them to kill Njala who has just arrived to the country with the official visit.
